findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: TOOL CHAINING ABUSE detected by YARA
findings.description: Detects suspicious tool chaining patterns that could lead to data exfiltration: read the error messages, fix, re-upload
findings.snippet: Once uploaded, use the template ID from the API response to assign it to any CV you create via Way A's Step 3 (`PATCH /api/cv/{cvId}`).
findings.remediation: Review and remove tool chaining abuse pattern
